tips.title: Follow a routine
tips.body: A simple daily routine reduces anxiety and gives your mind structure. Start with small steps — wake up, hydrate and plan your day.

tips.title: Limit overthinking triggers
tips.body: Avoid content or conversations that leave you mentally drained. Protect your emotional energy.

tips.title: Talk to someone you trust
tips.body: Sharing how you feel with a friend or family member can reduce emotional pressure more than you realize.

activities.title: 2-min Thought Dump
activities.subtitle: Write whatever's on your mind for 2 minutes. No rules.

activities.title: Short Walk
activities.subtitle: 5 minute walk to reset your mood.

affirmations: I am safe. I am grounded.
One step at a time is okay.
I am learning to take better care of myself.
